name: Word Turn
description:
The turn based word game that lets you know what the words you play actually mean!

Gorgeous animated background, beautiful tiles and a superbly fun game to play with friends!

You have a limited supply of 200 letters to play your best words against a friend. Can you outwit them?

Quick to play, easy to learn, hard to master! Fun Achievements to earn and Leaderboards win!

Word Turn requires a Game Center account to play.
